summary: HAVE A 96 LUMINA WITH REAL BAD BRAKES I GAVE RICHARDSON CHEVY THE NHTSA ID NUMBER.A RECALL ON THE POWER BOSTER, AND HE SAYS HE DONT KNOW ANYTHING OF SUCH A NUMBER,BASICLY JUST GETTING THE RUN AROUND FROM THEM. PLUS BEFORE THEN I HAD ALREADY TAKEN THE CAR TO ANOTHER DEALER ABOUT THE SAME PROBLEM .AND THEY PUT FRONT PADS ON IT AND SAID EVERYTHING ELSE WAS FINE (PURCH MOTORS)PLUS OTHER MISHAPS WITH THIS DEALER. WHAT CAN I DO NEXT TO GET SOME ANSWERS.. LUCKYLY I LIVE IN SMALL TOWN IF NOT WOULD OF BEEN IN AN ACCIDENT LONG TIME AGO.
